issue.title: [Python] Support conversion of list-of-struct in Array/Table.to_pandas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7872](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7872). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
STRUCT is not a supported value type for conversion yet

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/apache-arrow-0.16.0/cpp/src/arrow/python/arrow_to_pandas.cc#L137

See also https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/6442

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7872?focusedCommentId=17052647) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6532
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6532>
